name: Guilty Gear XX #Reload
description:
Guilty Gear XX #Reload is an arcade-fighting game developed by Arc System Works. It was originally released in 2004. Sammy Studios published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Guilty Gear XX #Reload is available on PC.
It was produced by Daisuke Ishiwatari. It was scored by Daisuke Ishiwatari and Koichi Seiyama.
